Berwyn.Triton College:
Triton College is a public community college located in River Grove, Illinois, 12 miles northwest of downtown Chicago. In 1973, Triton was featured in Time Magazine, who referred to it as "a new type of college that is redefining the concept for many Americans..." In 2016, the institution was ranked as the top community college in Illinois and #25 nationally according to the salaries of its graduates.


== History ==
Junior College District 300 was voted into existence in a referendum in March 1964.
